rukus.text: This scripture hav revealed vi - Vi ne haven dub gxi en your kor - Ke vi avert gxi proviz reminder believers
Vi shall all sekv ki revealed vi your Lord ne sekv any idols Him! Rarely do vi pren heed
Many community ni annihilated ili incurred our retribution while ili est asleep largx awake
Their utterance when our retribution ven them est Ja ni est transgressors
Ni certainly question those ricev message ni question messengers
Ni inform them authoritatively ni est neniam absent
Skal est atenc ke tag equitably. Those weights est heavy est winners
As por those weights est light ili est unu perd their anim consequence de disregarding our revelations unjustly
Ni establ vi ter ni hav proviz por vi means support therein! Rarely est vi appreciative
